root.name: Typing Karaoke
root.description: OverviewA browser game from Travis Chen; players must type lyrics to music in a similar way that one would sing lyrics during regular karaoke.TracklistJason Mraz - I Won't Give UpLMFAO - Sexy and I Know ItRadiohead - CreepCarly Rae Jepsen - Call Me MaybeUsher - OMGJonsi - Go DoEdward Sharpe - HomeKanye West - Love LockdownBon Iver - Skinny LoveStray Cats - Rock This Town
